page.original:
&ltOBJECT>.QUERY_GENIE() Syntax &ltOBJECT>.QUERY_GENIE( [ Query_Name as C ] ) ArgumentDescription Query_NameOptional. The name of a saved query operation.
Description The &ltOBJECT>.QUERY_GENIE() method applies to:
Browses (for &ltOBJECT> use either the &ltBROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for &ltOBJECT> use either the &ltFORM> pointer or the name of the form) The &ltOBJECT>.QUERY_GENIE() method displays the Query Genie dialog box. Limitations Desktop applications only. Example dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Travel Time") ptr.Query_Genie()
See Also Form Functions and Methods, Browse Functions and Methods
